titles.title: Same Day Registration Act
A bill to amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require States to provide for same day registration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 3/12/2013--Introduced. Same Day Registration Act - Amends the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require states with a voter registration requirement to make same-day voter registration available at the polling place on the date of election itself (or on the day of voting under early voting).
